name: Les Meules à Giverny (Collection)
description:
Claude Monet
1890-91

Haystacks is the title of a series of impressionist paintings by Monet. The primary subject of all of the paintings in the series are stacks of hay in the field after the harvest season. This series is among Monet's most notable work.

We managed to obtain a strong digital feed which displays some of the finest texture from the original canvases with only one minor glitch in transmission.We believe this artwork is a heavily cropped adaption with several of Monet's paintings collated into one. 

As far as we are aware this is all that remains in digital form, we are hoping to uncover more of Monet's work as we probe deeper into the old galleries.
